message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price of $180. I think it's a great value, and I'm confident you'll love it. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. I think that's a fair price for the product, considering its worth $150 to you. What do you think?

Thanks for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $100. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product for $140. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product. What do you think?

I understand that you're willing to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $130, but that's as high as I can go. Can you consider meeting me at that price?

I understand that you're willing to go up to $130, Bob, but I'm not willing to sell the product for that price. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product for $135. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $125, but that's as high as I can go. Can you consider meeting me at that price?

I understand that you're willing to go up to $125, Bob, but I'm not willing to sell the product for that price. I've already made a few concessions, and I'm not willing to go any lower. I'm going to have to pass on your offer and consider other options. I'll let you know if anything changes.
